actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to facilitate the immigration to the United States of certain aliens born in the Philippines or Japan who were fathered by United States citizens.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to include certain children born in the Philippines or Japan to a U.S. father among those children given preferential immigration treatment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to facilitate the immigration to the United States of certain aliens born in the Philippines or Japan who were fathered by United States citizens.
